title: You are looking for some amusement?

embed.description: Welcome to Kikipedia's channel on Twitch. Watch them stream League of Legends and other content live and join the community!

body:
A friend of mine is streaming right now!
Unranked to diamond and plays an epic riven!

If you are interested come and join us!

F24 IGN: better pings win if you got some questions or anything.

Hope to see you there!! <3
